# audioSamplePacketRefreshCount

**Instance Property**

The number of samples, starting at the current sample, that must be fed to the decoder to achieve full decoder refresh.

## Declaration

```swift
var audioSamplePacketRefreshCount: Int
```

## Discussion

The value of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleCursorAudioDependencyInfo/audioSampleIsIndependentlyDecodable] must be [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] for this value to take effect.

The value of this property is `0` for Immediate Playout Frames (IPFs).

## Querying independent decodability

- **audioSampleIsIndependentlyDecodable**: A Boolean value indicating whether the sample is independently decodable.
